column4: Hello there. I have a cruzer U3 4GB that worked perfectly so far (half a year or so). Suddenly, in the middle of using it, I can't mount it anymore. It got stuck in the middle of copying (from the usb to my computer), and I had to unmount it, and trying to mount it again fails.
It says: "there is probably no media in the drive"
I tried it on a Windows XP machine, there it claims that the drive is "unformatted", and asks if I want to format it now
sounds like the FAT32 table is corrupt.  You should use a standard file recovery program.  I'd suggest one but I can't think of any.
